question: 9. Why are Images often used on the webpage?
options: To create graphical buttons or links to other pages
To help the webpage load efficiently
Webpage cannot run/be displayed without at least one image
Because webpage doesnâ€™t support pure text
answer:
Answer: a
Explanation: Images are also used for better presentation of webpage. Any image can be turned into a link. Rather than putting text between the opening < a > tag and the closing < /a > tag, you simply place an image inside these tags.
correct_answer: To create graphical buttons or links to other pages
explanation: Images are also used for better presentation of webpage. Any image can be turned into a link. Rather than putting text between the opening < a > tag and the closing < /a > tag, you simply place an image inside these tags.
